item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.QCPCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi 8A China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 8A China

Codename: olivelite

Version: V12.0.1.0.QCPCNXM | 10.0

Size: 2.8 GB

MD5: 206fe6b910e45aa41b8431dff58a82fe

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Full screen gestures are now ignored on the Lock screen alarm page
Updated Android Security Patch to December 2020. Increased system security.
[System animations]
Optimization: Animations in selected scenes
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
Optimization: Control center is now closed by incoming calls
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Notification shade wasn't displayed correctly in Dark mode

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.QCPEUXM Recovery update for Redmi 8A EEA
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi 8A EEA

Codename: olivelite

MD5: 4f9bdb6c1893f0e84ec65d96e70d3d86

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Full screen gestures are now ignored on the Lock screen alarm page
Updated Android Security Patch to December 2020. Increased system security.
[System animations]
Optimization: Animations in selected scenes
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
Optimization: Control center is now closed by incoming calls
Optimization: Control center layout in landscape mode
Fix: Control center wasn't always displayed correctly in landscape mode
[Dark mode]
Optimization: Brightness and color improvements for wallpapers in Dark mode
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Notification shade wasn't displayed correctly in Dark mode

item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.QCPMIXM Recovery update for Redmi 8A Global
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi 8A Global

Codename: olivelite

Version: V12.0.1.0.QCPMIXM | 10.0

Size: 1.8 GB

MD5: 88d4cdcadc1de7132817c1820e8f6e1b

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Full screen gestures are now ignored on the Lock screen alarm page
Updated Android Security Patch to January 2021. Increased system security.
[System animations]
Optimization: Animations in selected scenes
[Privacy protection]
New: Use secure sharing to control what additional data is sent along with shared items.
New: MIUI 12 is the first Android-based mobile OS that went through the rigorous enhanced privacy protection testing.
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
Optimization: Control center is now closed by incoming calls
Optimization: Control center layout in landscape mode
Fix: Control center wasn't always displayed correctly in landscape mode
[Dark mode]
Optimization: Brightness and color improvements for wallpapers in Dark mode
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Notification shade wasn't displayed correctly in Dark mode
[Security]
New: New animations feel natural and refreshing.

Download: Here
